READ_THIS_FIRST.instruction_for_ai: DO NOT calculate totals from individual activities. Use the pre-calculated values in 'summary' and 'weekly_summary' sections below. These are already computed accurately from the API data.

summary.note: Duration calculated from API moving_time field. Minor differences (<30s) from Intervals.icu dashboard are normal due to rounding.

recent_activities.name: Extended Sweet Spot Prep: Cadence Focus

planned_workouts.name: Planned Workout
planned_workouts.description:
Unstructured Z1/Z2 for metabolic flush. Keep the chain loose, focus on low RPE.

Warmup
- Gentle Spin Build 5m ramp 40-60% 90rpm

Main Set
- Extended Active Recovery Spin (Low Z2) 50m 60% 90rpm

Cooldown
- Unload Spin Down 5m ramp 60-40% 85rpm

planned_workouts.name: Planned Workout
planned_workouts.description:
Light Zone 2 ride with 4x5 min bursts of 95+ RPM cadence focus. Get the legs turning over without adding fatigue.

Warmup
- 10 min Progressive Warmup 10m ramp 50-70%

Main Set
- Z2 Base Settling Period 5m 70%
- Cadence Focus 1 (Upper Z2) 5m 73% 100rpm
- Z2 Recovery (Vary Cadence) 5m 68% 88rpm
- Cadence Focus 2 (Upper Z2) 5m 73% 100rpm
- Z2 Recovery (Vary Cadence) 5m 68% 88rpm
- Cadence Focus 3 (Upper Z2) 5m 73% 100rpm
- Z2 Recovery (Vary Cadence) 5m 68% 88rpm
- Cadence Focus 4 (Upper Z2) 5m 73% 100rpm
- Z2 Recovery (Vary Cadence) 5m 68% 88rpm

Cooldown
- 5 min Cooldown 5m ramp 65-45%

planned_workouts.name: Planned Workout
planned_workouts.description:
Establish baseline Z2 effort. Focus strictly on maintaining 90+ RPM cadence targets during warm-up and throughout main set. Maintain VI < 1.05.

Warmup
- Easy Spin Ramp 5m ramp 50-65% 90rpm
- Cadence Priming 5m 65% 95rpm

Main Set
- Z2 Aerobic Base (10 min) 10m 70% 90rpm
- High Cadence Spin Drill 1/3 1m 75% 100rpm
- Recovery Spin 1m 55% 85rpm
- Z2 Sustain 1 (5 min) 5m 70% 90rpm
- High Cadence Spin Drill 2/3 1m 75% 100rpm
- Recovery Spin 1m 55% 85rpm
- Z2 Sustain 2 (5 min) 5m 70% 90rpm
- High Cadence Spin Drill 3/3 1m 75% 100rpm
- Recovery Spin 1m 55% 85rpm
- Z2 Steady Finish (14 min) 14m 70% 90rpm

Cooldown
- Ramp Down 5m ramp 60-40% 85rpm

planned_workouts.name: Planned Workout
planned_workouts.description:
Solid Z2 duration. Integrate high-cadence bursts (15 sec @ 105 RPM every 10 minutes) to reinforce neuromuscular pathways. Strict adherence to IF target.

Main Set

- Main Set Continuation 5m 70% 90rpm

Cooldown

planned_workouts.name: Planned Workout
planned_workouts.description:
Primary endurance stimulus. Maintain consistent Z2 effort. Execute 5 minutes of high cadence (>95 RPM) every 30 minutes. Monitor RPE vs. Power.

Warmup
- Easy Spin Ramp 5m ramp 50-60% 85rpm
- Z2 Prep 5m ramp 60-70% 90rpm

Main Set
- Foundational Z2 Block 1 25m 70% 88rpm
- High Cadence Drill 1 5m 70% 97rpm
- Foundational Z2 Block 2 25m 70% 88rpm
- High Cadence Drill 2 5m 70% 97rpm
- Foundational Z2 Block 3 25m 70% 88rpm
- High Cadence Drill 3 5m 70% 97rpm
- Foundational Z2 Block 4 25m 70% 88rpm
- High Cadence Drill 4 5m 70% 97rpm
- Final Z2 Sustained Effort 15m 70% 88rpm

Cooldown
- Cool Down Spin 5m ramp 70-50% 80rpm

planned_workouts.name: Planned Workout
planned_workouts.description:
Longest midweek Z2 session yet. Focus is on maintaining duration consistency and high-quality technical execution deep into the session to combat muscular fatigue.

- 10 min Progressive Spin 10m ramp 50-70% 90rpm

Main Set
- Z2 Efficiency Block - High Cadence 30m 70% 95rpm
- Muscular Torque Check 1 (80 RPM) 5m 70% 80rpm
- Sustained Z2 Power (90 RPM) 30m 70% 90rpm
- Muscular Torque Check 2 (85 RPM) 5m 70% 85rpm
- Z2 Durability - High Consistency Focus 30m 70% 92rpm

Cooldown
